tweets.text: I am shamed to say the pit fall of new planting scheme. Plastic pots. Their is 500 of them in this dumpy bag. We must do more in the Horticultural sector. @ladyhort8 @InsideDevon @DevonLiveNews @DevonCC @defra @The_RHS @EnvAgency @recycle_now https://t.co/q7haMGC1W9
It never ends does it? The relentless morale-beating that comes from living in a country with an environmental protection body as broken as the @EnvAgency https://t.co/K2Ub0hL4vc

@ChrisGPackham @EnvAgency @ClintonDevon @kiergroup @NESouthWest @WiseBirding As previously commented on original post Please report this to the EA incident line 0800 807060 to highlight potential W&CA offence. Too late in year to clear this sort of vegetation regardless of Ecological checks! 😠

Breaking News . @EnvAgency have sanctioned the destruction of breeding birds tomorrow at the Lower Otter Restoration Project . This is #HS2 part 2 . PLEASE THINK AGAIN @ClintonDevon @kiergroup @NESouthWest Please follow @WiseBirding and RT https://t.co/I8Wv40YKqy
@york_travel @iTravelYork @CityofYork @Perkypeacock1 https://t.co/g15cT7zawx
https://t.co/UY6RDxTMFZ

@scottdegg @EnvAgencyMids @ClareDinnisEA @RedIndustries2 @PHE_uk @StinkStopthe I listened closely to the words of @ClareDinnisEA during her Radio Stoke interview on Friday. The key point I picked up is future scrutiny of what is being tipped in the landfill. When asked if that meant unlicensed waste has been put in there she didn’t give a straight answer!

Basically the issue is @EnvAgency can’t afford to pay for the finishing if they were to close @RedIndustries2 down, so they expected us to live with landfill gas tell 2026 they need holding accountable @SimonTagg @AaronBell4NUL @DefraGovUK @StinkStopthe @Cap_it_off #AirPollution https://t.co/ym8CKAmjgu
@rockerblonde @ladyhort8 @InsideDevon @DevonLiveNews @DevonCC @defra @The_RHS @EnvAgency @recycle_now I reuse all my plastic pots time after time. I haven’t bought any for years and run a nursery

@lapetitepie @sherbsvilletv @GarethDennis @ChrisGPackham @EnvAgency @ClintonDevon @kiergroup @NESouthWest @WiseBirding That is EXACTLY what he is doing, yes. That is my point: taking HS2’s evil as read, just as the World Wars were. But it isn’t evil in my opinion. So, not disingenuous at all. And I don’t watch a film when I don’t like the trailer. It cannot affect my point re the tweet.
@Samanth33412592 @EnvAgency @RedIndustries2 @SimonTagg @AaronBell4NUL @DefraGovUK @StinkStopthe @Cap_it_off Not if we've got anything to do with it. We will fight them every inch of the way ✊❤️❤️

urls.title: Petition: Review the Regulation of Odour Management of Landfill Sites
urls.description: We call for the Government to review how the Environment Agency monitors and manages levels of malodourous gasses. Consideration should be given to compulsory monitoring of emissions of landfill sites and for the EA to be obliged to act with urgency when high levels of odour complaints are received.
